alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Clinch; Echols; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 2:26PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, northwestern Baker, northeastern Columbia, west central Camden, southeastern Echols, southwestern Brantley, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and Charlton Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 225 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Race Pond to 8 miles south of Stephen Foster State Park to near Belmont. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hilliard, Folkston, Fargo, Stephen Foster State Park, Homeland, Needmore, Race Pond and Winokur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Clinch; Echols; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
